forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 5 to 14 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 7 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun begins to tuck itself beneath the horizon, Downtown San Francisco finds itself enveloped in a serene stillness, with a gentle breeze whispering through the streets. The current temperature hovers comfortably, embracing the mildness of evening air around 51 degrees. Tonight offers a mostly clear sky, allowing for glimpses of the deepening hues of twilight. The west-southwest wind, though light, possesses a sharper edge, indicative of the evening chill—perfect circumstances to don a light jacket as you savor an evening stroll or settle into a cozy café.

Looking ahead to the morrow, expect a lovely day bathed in sunshine. The warmth will linger, reaching a high near 63, with hints of clouds playfully drifting across the sky. Humidity may rise along the coastal stretches, teasing the specter of morning fog, though it should clear as the day progresses. For those who appreciate the subtleties of the city’s rhythm, perhaps enjoy a casual lunch at one of the waterfront eateries or an afternoon walk through the parks, where the vibrant colors of late spring are on glorious display. Remember to layer your attire, with the morning chill coaxing you to wear something more substantial, yet shedding it as the afternoon beckons to bask in warmer, sunny delight.
